text: Hi huys, Iâ€™m new here and Nice to meet you all :smile:
Thanks <@U22PKFRU5>!!! I'm from Des Moines, IA. I'm brand new to HubSpot, but so far it's been good!

I'm personally not that familiar with that area of the tool. Those feel like great questions for <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com> or calling into support. (sorry, don't mean to bounce you somewhere else, but I think those are the best places to get the help you need :slightly_smiling_face: )
Welcome! We're excited to have you in the slack :hamsterdance:

Oh awesome - I'm originally from Milwaukee, WI. Fellow Mid-Westerner. Welcome
Glad to hear you're enjoying HubSpot so far! :bmo: What types of projects do you work on?
Oh awesome! - HubSpot is a big system, lots to learn. This community is a great place for any coding related questions. Congrats on investing in yourself to learn a new tool. :applause:

I believe that can be done with a custom button (using the CTA, but just for the text link) that triggers a modal <@UFCTG5H2L> - Or other option is to not use the CTA tool... just use custom button+modal and do reporting via event report. I'd also check out the HubSpot Marketplace (<https://marketplace.HubSpot.com>) to see if someone's built something like this already. :slightly_smiling_face:
